name: obscenely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is offensive, rude, or shocking, usually because of being too obviously related to sex or showing sex: He used vulgar language and gestured obscenely. She cursed obscenely in exasperation.
to a degree that makes you feel dislike or moral disapproval: He's obscenely rich/fat/cruel. obscenely expensive handbags See
obscene
